titleStmt.title: Reason and religion, or, The certain rule of faith where the infallibility of the Roman Catholick Church is asserted, against atheists, heathens, Jewes, Turks, and all sectaries : with a refutation of Mr. Stillingfleets many gross errours / by E.W.
titleStmt.author: E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Antwerp by Michael Cnobbaert,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
